channel.title: Jdk
channel.description:
I've DL'd JDK 7...but anytime i look in the bin i see like 500 apps and idk which to use to edit?
I'm doing a noob beginners guide courtesy of sam's 21 learn java crap... except he never specifies where to do any of this work @_@

item.title: Jdk
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

Read my earlier post. Call that program to compile under the following batch file line:

javac *.java

It will compile all java files inside the folder that the batch file was located in.

Read full topic

item.title: Jdk
item.dc:creator: @TSK_Ben TSK_Ben
item.description:
@TSK_Ben wrote:

JDK is way confusing to me…

I open JDK v7 or w/e and i don’t know where to go from there, shows lots of other folders don’t see a main run program for commands or anything, do i go to my cmd prompt to do all this or what? Nothing is specified @_@

Read full topic

item.title: Jdk
item.dc:creator: @TSK_Ben TSK_Ben
item.description:
@TSK_Ben wrote:

"Enter the text of Listing 1.1 and save the file as VolcanoRobot.java in
a folder you are using to work on programs from this book. " - Sam’s Teach yourself java in 21 days.

Does he mean notepad for the text listing o.O?

EDIT: I am an idiot, Notepad++ is amazing and I almost instantly new what java was talking about lmfao.

Read full topic
